artist: Author: Mike Kraus , et al.; Publisher: Urban Guerrilla Zine, Berkeley
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of skulls, cats, figures, and various other subjects, with text, printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 28 pp.
title: Urban Guerrilla Zine, no. 8
